text: About 2 hours waiting for take photo here. Better one person only max take 5 photo there.

Very clean and quiet. Running like clockwork and no breakdowns detected. Spacious and modern unique design. There are walkways to nearby buildings including Liang Court. Staff is friendly and don't appear to be stressed. World class transportation.

Covid19 caused this big and clean station to be so empty and lifeless. It used to be busy. Downtown line stations are my favourite. So clean and nice. Can even sleep on the floor there since its so clean. Toilets are the best among all the other lines. Big and clean. Pre or during or post covid, cleanliness still no 1. Kudos to all the staff there especially cleaning staff. Hope all train lines in Singapore follow this exemplary example.

Straightforward train station, nothing much to complain, other than it's a little below underground. Toilets are clean, stations are well maintained, like all other Downtown Line stations. This isn't much different. This though, doesn't have retail outlets unlike some other bigger stations. One bummer is how it takes a long roundabout to get to Newton interchange, and it becomes a natural dilemmas whether to switch at Little India (next stop) and walk, or to sit through the 16 minutes.
